div.p: Introducing Scotland's first and best PHP conference. ScotlandPHP is a one-day conference, being held on Saturday October 29th 2016 in our nation's capital, Edinburgh. The conference venue is the super-awesome Dynamic Earth, in the spectacular surroundings of Holyrood Park and Edinburgh's historic Old Town.
There will be two tracks across the day, packed with the best speakers around and bookended by keynotes from world class speakers: Anthony Ferrara and Jessica Rose.
Visit the ScotlandPHP Conference website for further details and to purchase tickets.
